nodes.text: Patrol Zulu, Able, Mary 341 was part of Jerec's battle group in 5 ABY.
The patrol was commanded by Lieutenant Aagon and consisted of a skimmer, two speeder bikes, and a platoon of stormtroopers, including Sergeant Forley and Leeno.

While assigned to patrol east of the Valley of the Jedi, Aagon instead took his patrol north into a region inhabited by indigenous Bouncers. A resourceful man, Aagon allowed his men to hunt the bouncers to remedy the monotony of patrol.
The patrol group was completely destroyed by a group of settlers including Grif Grawley and Portia, and led by Kyle Katarn and Jan Ors.
